DOC.brief_summary: The object study compare internet-delivered treatment insomnia waiting-list . In study participant randomize : 1 ) online cognitive-behavioral 2 ) waiting-list . Participants waiting-list condition receive treatment post-test . The intervention consist : diary ; psycho-education ; relaxation exercise ; stimulus control/sleep hygiene ; sleep restriction ; challenge misconception sleep ; paradoxical exercise . Adult person insomnia invite via popular scientific website fill online questionnaire . Participants fill questionnaire dairy baseline post-test , 3-month follow-up , 6-month follow-up . In study interested sleep-related worry daily complaint measure diary . We expect online intervention ameliorate sleep-related worry daily complaint . Furthermore , expect sleep related worry mediates effect intervention sleep- daily complaint .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered CBT Insomnia : Role Sleep-related Cognitions
DOC.criteria: Insomnia disorder accord DSM5 Sleep onset latency/wake sleep onset > 30 minute , three time week Insomnia three month long Access internet Earlier cognitive behavioral treatment insomnia Start psychological treatment last 6 month Doing shift work Pregnancy breast feed Schizophrenia psychosis Suicidal plan Sleep apnea drug alcohol abuse
